overview: A sensual play depicting a bizarre love triangle between a beautician and two men, starting with a fire at a love hotel. Director Mitsuru Meike, the genius of the pink film world, has received high acclaim for his meticulous depiction of sexual love, where lies and truth are confused, mixed with humor and pathos. Asako (Yumeka Sasaki) and Yamada (Yota Kawase), who got drunk on their first meeting and went straight to the hotel, spent a hot night but were separated due to a fire. Firefighter Sudo (Tanaka Yoji), who fell in love with Asako at first sight when she was rescued, takes advantage of her vague memories to pretend to be her partner that night.
title: 美容師の恋
